name: spiderwort
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an American plant with groups of flowers, usually blue, but also white, pink, or purple. There are many different species (= types) of spiderwort, some of which are used in food or herbal medicine.
cliper/ iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
